slip_stitch to beginning chain to join 22 sts per side and 4 chain-2 corners fasten_off round 8 attach color c with single_crochet in dtr following any corner chain-2 space single_crochet in each of next 21 sts 2 single_crochet chain 2 2 single_crochet in chain-2 corner space single_crochet in each of next 22 sts 3 times 2 single_crochet chain 2 2 single_crochet in chain-2 corner space slip_stitch in beginning single_crochet to join 26 single_crochet per side and 4 chain-2 corner spaces fasten_off round 9 attach color b with double_crochet in any chain-2 corner space chain 2 double_crochet in same space double_crochet in each of next 26 sts double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in chain-2 corner space 3 times double_crochet in each of next 26 sts slip_stitch in beginning double_crochet to join 28 sts per side and 4 chain-2 corner spaces fasten_off surface crochet with right side facing attach color c with single_crochet on the post of the marked beginning chain in round 2 4 single_crochet in same chain space fpsc around double_crochet at base of chain rotate the block and work 5 single_crochet up the post of next treble_crochet single_crochet in space between this treble_crochet and the next one rotate block 5 single_crochet around post of next treble_crochet fpsc around double_crochet at base of treble_crochet rotate block 5 single_crochet around post of next treble_crochet single_crochet between treble_crochet s 9 times slip_stitch in beginning single_crochet to join fasten_off and weave in ends © 2012 joyce d lewis simple 10-petal afghan square page 2 of 3 recently my friend lettice used this pattern to make a block for an afghan but it wasn t large enough so she added rounds she did such a great job that her version of the block was chosen as the filler block for august 2017 in the block- a-month cal she has kindly offered her notes on those additional rounds follow original instructions through round 9 shell skip 2 double_crochet 3 double_crochet picot 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet skip 2 double_crochet slip_stitch in next st round
